mutants.original_line: check = lt if command.startswith('<') else gt
mutants.mutated_line: check = lt if command.startswith('') else gt

mutants.original_line: result = [list(x) for x in combinations(arr, i) if all(starmap(check, zip(x, x[1:])))]
mutants.mutated_line: result = [list(x) for x in combinations(arr, i) if all(starmap(check, zip(x, x[2:])))]

mutants.original_line: result = [list(x) for x in combinations(arr, i) if all(starmap(check, zip(x, x[1:])))]
mutants.mutated_line: result = [list(x) for x in combinations(arr, i) if all(starmap(check, zip(x, x[0:])))]

mutants.original_line: result = [list(x) for x in combinations(arr, i) if all(starmap(check, zip(x, x[1:])))]
mutants.mutated_line: result = [list(x) for x in combinations(arr, i) if all(starmap(check, zip(x, x[0:])))]

mutants.original_line: result = [list(x) for x in combinations(arr, i) if all(starmap(check, zip(x, x[1:])))]
mutants.mutated_line: result = [list(x) for x in combinations(arr, i) if all(starmap(check, zip(x, x[-1:])))]
